text: Text is rotated when reference orientation != 0. However, images are not. Please see the attached sample FO

creator: bowditch_chris@hotmail.com
text:

Sample FO that demos bug

creator: bowditch_chris@hotmail.com
text:
Created attachment 24762
sample FO that demos the bug

Update: The bug does not affect simple images as first thought. It is more specific than that. Only when images are replaced by Page Segments are they not rotated according to reference-orientation. I have updated the sample FO and now it really does demo the bug!
